data.eml:eml: The goldrim surgeonfish (Acanthurus nigricans, Acanthuridae) from Diego Garcia, Chagos Archipelago: first record for the central Indian Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Craig, Matthew T. (2008): The goldrim surgeonfish (Acanthurus nigricans, Acanthuridae) from Diego Garcia, Chagos Archipelago: first record for the central Indian Ocean. Zootaxa 1850: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183400
